article.name: Fader
article.description:
This was a test piece to prove that it is infact possible to fade an object using actionscript rathen then using a tween.
Of course its possible! I do this thing in my sleep these days! (Not kidding).
Anyway, when I wake up, remind me to work out what the image is supposed to be. Things are supposed to have meaning. This piece means to be somewhere esle. I think if it were meaner it\'d have left the country. I don\'t know why I keep it. I suppose I wanted to publish everything of any worth.
This piece has worth, it enabled the other fader.
article.keywords: fader action script flash image wort mean meaning nasty cruel macromedia fade alpha brightness tint self running movie clip reuse code
